title: Unofficial Avicus Resource Pack! ^~^

replies.body:
It is absolutely beautiful, it retains the old feel of the Minecraft Resource pack but gives it a more, modern, "avicus" look.

I am an absolute sucker for good-looking skies, and your texture pack made me cringe >.<

All in all, 9/10!
